channel.title: The Silent Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: 10 minutes of stillness in your day
channel.itunes:author: Gabriel Krieshok
channel.itunes:summary: The Silent Podcast is a 10-minute pocket of stillness in your day. Listen to it at a set time every day, in the middle of a busy commute, or when you simply need a break from all of the hustle and bustle of distraction around you.
channel.description: The Silent Podcast is a 10-minute pocket of stillness in your day. Listen to it at a set time every day, in the middle of a busy commute, or when you simply need a break from all of the hustle and bustle of distraction around you.

item.title: Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Gabriel Krieshok
item.itunes:subtitle: The Silent Podcast: Episode 1
item.description: Episode 1 — January 12, 2018 Welcome to the Silent Podcast, a 10-minute pocket of stillness in your day. Show Notes Available at http://thesilentpodcast.com/2018/episode-1.html.
